description_html:
This Fall, Pollack introduces its introductory Hospitality collection, a curated mix of perfect textures and colors designed to meet the needs of the hospitality market. Eight window fabrics, all inherently flame retardant, and seven upholsteries, all over 100,000 double rubs, brilliantly combine a first-class look with performance and price.
Additional performance finishes can be applied to any of these offerings according to the needs of the project.
